core.description: The core of custom form elements. Includes cfe.generic and some slight addons to the native Element object.
core.name: core

cfe.module.password.description: Replaces for elements of type: input[type=password]

createOriginal.description: Method to programmatically create an "original" HTMLElement

type.description: Describes the type of this element (Password)

selector.description: CSS Selector to fetch "original" HTMLElements for replacement with this module

cfe.module.password.name: cfe.module.password

cfe.generic.name: cfe.generic

disabled.description: setting this to true will create a disabled element

spacer.description: path to transparent spacer.gif; it's used for easy css-styling

replaces.description: if this element shall replace an existing html form element, pass it here

aliasType.description: the element's wrapper will be of this type (e.g. span or div)

label.description: may pass any element as a label (toggling, hovering,..) for this cfe

constructors.description:
constructor
set options, defines basic replacement and building algorithm for cfe (template method)

onBlur.description:
standard blur-behaviour
removes focus state from alias

hover.description:
standard mouseover-behaviour
add hover state to alias

onClick.description: delegate click events to original item

onUpdate.description: fires if the original element changes

release.description:
standard press-behaviour
removes press state to alias

unhover.description:
standard mouseout-behaviour
removes hover state from alias

press.description:
standard press-behaviour
add press state to alias

onFocus.description:
standard focus-behaviour
adds focus state to alias

setupWrapper.description:
adds events and mousepointer style to the "decorator"
usually gets called by buildWrapper

getFull.description: retreive the label and the alias

setupOriginal.description:
handles the creation of the underlying original form element
stores a reference to the cfe object in the original form element

initialize.description:
constructor
set options, defines basic replacement and building algorithm for cfe (template method)

type.description: Describes the type of this element (e.g. Selector, Checkbox or Radiobutton)

options.description: basic options for all cfes and always available

cfe.generic.description: cfe.generic gets extended by modules to start off with standard, button-like behaviours.

cfe.modules.select.name: cfe.modules.select
cfe.modules.select.extends:
cfe.generic
bug:
height of options too small if option with linebreak; standalone and scrolling bug
cfe.modules.select.superclass:
cfe.generic
bug:
height of options too small if option with linebreak; standalone and scrolling bug

cfe.module.slider.description: generates a slider for a text field
cfe.module.slider.name: cfe.module.slider

cfe.modules.file.name: cfe.modules.file
cfe.modules.file.extends:
cfe.generic
bug:
update event onMouseOut triggers even if nothing changed
ff 3.0.7     - no pointer
opera        - no pointer; no focus on label if ori focussed, click event triggers twice
ie 8         - no focus on label if ori focussed
ie 7         - no focus on label if ori focussed
cfe.modules.file.superclass:
cfe.generic
bug:
update event onMouseOut triggers even if nothing changed
ff 3.0.7     - no pointer
opera        - no pointer; no focus on label if ori focussed, click event triggers twice
ie 8         - no focus on label if ori focussed
ie 7         - no focus on label if ori focussed

cfe.modules.radio.name: cfe.modules.radio
cfe.modules.radio.extends:
cfe.module.checkbox
bug:
ie 8         - rb alias w/o implicit labelling trigger update twice; ori triggers update twice
ie 7         - rb alias w/o implicit labelling trigger update twice; ori triggers update twice
cfe.modules.radio.superclass:
cfe.module.checkbox
bug:
ie 8         - rb alias w/o implicit labelling trigger update twice; ori triggers update twice
ie 7         - rb alias w/o implicit labelling trigger update twice; ori triggers update twice

autotab.name: autotab
autotab.author: Maik

attachDependencies.description:
this is called when a new item of a cfemodule gets initialized
it checks, whether there are dependencies for this element and adds them to its options

autotab.description: this adds autotabbing functionality to cfe

themes.name: themes
themes.description: this adds theming functionality to cfe

cfe.module.select_multiple.name: cfe.module.select_multiple
cfe.module.select_multiple.description: replaces select fields with attribute multiple set

cfe.module.submit.name: cfe.module.submit

constructors.description: Extends the generic module to replace inputs of type 'submit'

cfe.module.submit.description: Extends the generic module to replace inputs of type 'submit'

Element.Helpers.name: Element.Helpers
Element.Helpers.description: extend Elements with some Helper functions

toggleCheckboxes.name: toggleCheckboxes
toggleCheckboxes.description: implements selectAll/deselectAll functionality into custom form elements
